Pre-Game Insights: Malawi are ranked 125th in the world and have only three points from their first two matches in the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers.
Sao Tome and Principe are ranked 188th and have not won a game since March 2022, with a poor recent form of 11 games without a win.
This is the first official meeting between the two teams.
Others: Sao Tome have failed to score in six of their last seven games.
Malawi have lost their last three official games.
